message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $150. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $150 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $130. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product.
